nodes.text: Atron was a planet located within the Atron system of the Mid Rim's Senex sector.

Atron was the crowded homeworld of House Garonnin. Other planets, like Boro-borosa III, would send prisoners to one of Atron's well-known prisons. It was one of the Senex sector's busiest ports, however, House Picutorion controlled the nearby planet of Tekurr'k, and undercut Atron by selling the raw materials that Atron lacked the capacity to mine.
